protocol.title: 7: User-friendly protocol: Retina Tissue Sections RNA FISH
protocol.title_html: 7: User-friendly protocol: Retina Tissue Sections RNA FISH

source.description:
Dissect neural retinas in PBS and fix in
(diluted from
, Thermo Fisher #28908) for
at
.

Prepare PDL using
dissolved in
, diluted from
with ddH2O.

Store PDL in aliquots at
.

Apply PDL 8-well Ibidi chamber slide (Cat #80827) for at least
.
Then remove PDL.
Dry the slide.
Wash once in ddH2O.
Dry again.
Place the PDL coated and fully dried slide inside the cryostat ahead of sectioning. Do not remove slide until all sections are in place or condensation will form that can impede adhesion.

Place sections inside wells using brushes, and flatten sections as much as possible to prevent folding when the slide is transferred to
.

After removing the slide from the chamber, spin at
for
(plate spinner centrifuge) 1-2 times to promote adhesion.

Wash sections 3×
in PBSTw to remove OCT.

Wash sections
in PBSTw to remove OCT. (1/3)

Wash sections
in PBSTw to remove OCT. (2/3)

Wash sections
in PBSTw to remove OCT. (3/3)
Replace PBSTw with Whyb.

Place in hybridization oven set to
, minimum
.

Replace Whyb with Hyb1/Probe mixture pre-warmed to
. Seal chamber with parafilm. Fill unused wells with Whyb to maintain humidity in the chamber sli.

Incubate
minimum.
Replace Hyb1 with Whyb (quick wash to remove residual Hyb1).

Wash 2×
in Whyb.

Wash
in Whyb. (1/2)

Wash
in Whyb. (2/2)

Wash 2×
in
.

Wash
in
. (1/2)

Wash
in
. (2/2)

Return to
(Pause point: sample can be stored in
or PBSTw at
for several weeks).

Replace
with PBSTw (2 washes at
).

Set oven to
.

Transfer slide to
for hybridization and subsequent wash steps.
Once slide is warm, remove PBSTw and add Hyb2/fluor solution (prewarmed).

Incubate at least
at
.
Replace Hyb2 with PBSTw (prewarmed, quick wash).

Wash 2×
in PBSTw.

Wash
in PBSTw. (1/2)

Return to
(Pause point: Samples can be stored at
without obvious signal loss for at least 1 week).
Wash once in PBS and add mounting media until sections are covered (See below for notes on imaging).

Embed retinas in a 1:1 (v/v) mixture of
and OCT, frozen in ethanol bath (200 proof ethanol cooled in dry ice). Be careful to ensure that ethanol bath does not contact the embedded retina or the embedding solution.`

prior to sectioning.

description: This protocol is about SABER RNA FISH with retina tissue.
